languages.text: "Мы видим угрозу тому, что несет Империум. Вся эта сложная вязь заветов, упорное движение мириадов сквозь тьму по воле золотого света. Все то, о чем мы не знали, но в объятьях чего родились и выросли. Ему грозит опасность. Как минимум в просторе Коронус".

"We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Мы видим угрозу тому, что несет Империум. Вся эта сложная вязь заветов, упорное движение мириадов сквозь тьму по воле золотого света. Все то, о чем мы не знали, но в объятьях чего родились и выросли. Ему грозит опасность. Как минимум в просторе Коронус".

languages.text: 「我々には帝国がもたらす脅威が見える。複雑に入り組んだ教義、黄金の光の意志による闇を通じた数多の進化。我々にとってこれら全ては奇妙ではあれど、その中で我々は生まれ育った。それら全てが危険に晒されている。少なくともコロヌス・エクスパンスの境界の中で」
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「我々には帝国がもたらす脅威が見える。複雑に入り組んだ教義、黄金の光の意志による闇を通じた数多の進化。我々にとってこれら全ては奇妙ではあれど、その中で我々は生まれ育った。それら全てが危険に晒されている。少なくともコロヌス・エクスパンスの境界の中で」

languages.text: “我们看到了巨大的威胁，将危及帝国的一切。无数人凭借金色之光的意志在黑暗中坚定前进，传播教义。对我们而言，这一切都是那么陌生，但我们却在它们的怀抱中出生、长大。而现在，这所有的一切都处于危险之中，至少科罗努斯扩区之内是这样。”
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “我们看到了巨大的威胁，将危及帝国的一切。无数人凭借金色之光的意志在黑暗中坚定前进，传播教义。对我们而言，这一切都是那么陌生，但我们却在它们的怀抱中出生、长大。而现在，这所有的一切都处于危险之中，至少科罗努斯扩区之内是这样。”

languages.text: "Wir sehen eine Gefahr für alles, was das Imperium bringt. Der komplizierte Plexus der Grundsätze, der entschlossene Vormarsch von Myriaden durch die Dunkelheit, angetrieben vom Willen des goldenen Lichts. All die Dinge, die uns fremd waren, doch in deren Umarmung wir geboren wurden und aufgewachsen sind. All das ist in Gefahr. Zumindest innerhalb der Grenzen der Koronus-Ausdehnung."
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sehen eine Gefahr für alles, was das Imperium bringt. Der komplizierte Plexus der Grundsätze, der entschlossene Vormarsch von Myriaden durch die Dunkelheit, angetrieben vom Willen des goldenen Lichts. All die Dinge, die uns fremd waren, doch in deren Umarmung wir geboren wurden und aufgewachsen sind. All das ist in Gefahr. Zumindest innerhalb der Grenzen der Koronus-Ausdehnung."

languages.text: « Nous voyons une menace à ce que l'Imperium engendre. Le plexus complexe des préceptes, la détermination de milliers de vies à braver les ténèbres en suivant la volonté de la lumière dorée. Toutes ces choses qui nous étaient étrangères, mais dans l'étreinte desquelles nous sommes nés et avons grandi. Tout cela est menacé. Du moins, dans le périmètre des Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Nous voyons une menace à ce que l'Imperium engendre. Le plexus complexe des préceptes, la détermination de milliers de vies à braver les ténèbres en suivant la volonté de la lumière dorée. Toutes ces choses qui nous étaient étrangères, mais dans l'étreinte desquelles nous sommes nés et avons grandi. Tout cela est menacé. Du moins, dans le périmètre des Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: «Percibimos una amenaza para todo aquello que el Imperium representa. El intrincado plexo de preceptos, el determinado viaje de miríadas de almas a través de la negrura del espacio merced a la voluntad de la luz dorada. Todo lo que fue desconocido para nosotros, mas en cuyo seno fuimos engendrados y criados. Todo está en peligro, al menos dentro de los confines de la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Percibimos una amenaza para todo aquello que el Imperium representa. El intrincado plexo de preceptos, el determinado viaje de miríadas de almas a través de la negrura del espacio merced a la voluntad de la luz dorada. Todo lo que fue desconocido para nosotros, mas en cuyo seno fuimos engendrados y criados. Todo está en peligro, al menos dentro de los confines de la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un sunduklarına yönelik bir tehdit görüyoruz. İlkelerin karmakarışık ağı... Sayısız varlığın, altın ışığın iradesiyle karanlıktaki kararlı ilerleyişi... Bize tuhaf gelmesine rağmen kucağında doğup yetiştiğimiz her şey. Hepsi tehlike altında... En azından Koronus Enginliği'nde öyle."
languages.original_text: "We see a threat to that which the Imperium brings. The intricate plexus of tenets, the determined advance of myriads through darkness by the will of the golden light. All the things that were strange to us yet in whose embrace we were born and raised. All of it is in danger. At least within the bounds of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un sunduğu şeye yönelik bir tehdit görüyoruz. İlkelerin karmakarışık ağı... Sayısız varlığın, altın ışığın iradesiyle karanlığın içinden geçen kararlı ilerlemesi... Bize tuhaf gelmesine rağmen kucağında doğup yetiştiğimiz her şey. Hepsi tehlike altında... En azından Koronus Enginliği'nde öyle."
